about_the_game:
Elephant Games AR, creators of the Halloween Stories series, brings you the next macabre chapter with Halloween Stories: Written in Blood!

Life is never dull when you’re on a team of paranormal investigators! The Debunkers are about to find out for themselves when they’re asked to investigate strange phenomena at the museum. The trouble seems to be connected to the arrival of a mysterious black book that the museum intended to feature at a spooky special exhibit devoted to horror. No sooner do they arrive than a terrible sorcerer named Barlow kidnaps George and Shen, leaving Catherine to fight her way through a twisted, haunting version of the museum to discover Barlow’s plans, stop him, and save her friends! Help Catherine follow the clues, crack the case, and defeat evil itself in this chilling Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure game!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won't find in the standard version. The Collector's Edition includes:

  •  Continue your adventures with a special pet in the Bonus Chapter!

  •  Stay a step ahead of Barlow with the strategy guide!

  •  Scour locations to find puzzle pieces and collectibles!

  •  Creepy music tracks to get in the spooky spirit!

  •  Enjoy exclusive music, wallpapers, and more!

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.
